name: eScape UP!
description:
Your home world is under attack!

Escape the burning char of your world and ascend UP towards space going through 9 levels that get darker and darker until you reach you final destination - Space.

Please keep in mind that you jetpack is damaged and constantly loosing fuel, the only way you can continue your escape is buy collecting more and more fuel cells.

Along the way you will encounter different obsticales such as Bombs, Electric debris, falling Meteors and more... 

Luckily your jetback is well equipped to handle these kind of risks with 3 cool abilities - a Shield that will destroy anything in its path, a Fading mechanism that will enable you to shortly fade out of trouble, and in case you miss a fuel cell or two, you can always use a quick nitro Boost to climb back up at full speed!

Now is the time to eScape UP!

Movement and Abilities:

  • Use "A" & "D" to move Left and Right
  • Use "Space" for boost
  • Use "Q" to activate your Shield ability
  • Use "E" to activate your Fade ability

This Game was made by me, a solo gameDev, using Unity for all the gameDev needs, Photoshop for my art, BFXR for sound effects and Milenote for game Design.

Background music - Main level music: Slaking_97, Menus music: Bipwavef (both from Freesound.org)

How-To-Play options:

  1. Browser - just click and enjoy!
  2. PC - 
    1. Download the ZIP file
    2. Unzip it
    3. Launch the game by clicking on "eScape UP.exe"
    4. Enjoy! :)
  3. Android - Follow the google store link and enjoy :)
